They believe Michael Vick has asked for, and earned, forgiveness. But that doesn't tell the whole story. Dwaine Caraway didn't just offer Michael Vick Dallas' "forgiveness." - who got engaged to make-up artist Mezhgan Hussainy last February- admits he struggles to relate to very young kids, but would love to have youngsters of his own to play games with. He said: I worry about it- because of my age. When I was a youngster, my dad used to play soccer and games with me. And I worry that if I was 70. "Also, if children could be born at the age of five I'd quite like that. I like them at that age when they can talk and understand. I'm not sure I could deal with the whole "ga ga goo' thing. But I genuinely like kids. Simon Cowell also admitted Mezhgan, 36, has "softened" him and has finally made him think about settling down forever.
